pet.name: Bark Box
pet.information: Bark Box is a box of dog joy delivered monthly form the dog-obsessed Bark family directly to dogs and their people.  The classic assortment is two toys, two treats, and one chew tailor fit your dog's breed, size, and needs.  A monthly subscription is $35 a month.  A 6-month pre-paid subscription is $25 a month, totaling $150, twice a year.  An annual pre-paid subscription is $22 a month, totaling $264, once a year.  For more information, go to barkbox.com.
pet.paragraph1: Bark Box is a box of dog joy delivered monthly form the dog-obsessed Bark family directly to dogs and their people.  The classic assortment is two toys, two treats, and one chew tailor fit your dog's breed, size, and needs.
pet.paragraph2:
Price List:
Monthly: $35/month
6-Month: $25/month = $150 - twice a year
Annual: $22/month = $264 - once a year

box of the week.name: Breo Box
box of the week.information: Breo Box is a seasonal subscription service for both men and women, curated with the coolest, most unique products that you never knew you needed.  A seasonal subscription is $159, four times a year.  An annual plan is $579 a year.  For more information, go to www.breobox.com.
box of the week.paragraph1: Breo Box is a seasonal subscription service for both men and women, curated with the coolest, most unique products that you never knew you needed.

male-baby.name: Little Bibs Box
male-baby.information: Who says baby bibs have to be boring? Litte Bibs subscription box is packed with premium soft bibs to keep your baby's clothing clean and dry, after feeding or heavy drooling.  Receive four specially curated designs every month for $19.99.  For more information, go to www.cratejoy.com.

male-child.name: We Craft Box
male-child.information: We Craft Box is an award-winning monthly kids craft kit delivered to the home of kids ages 3 to 9.  With a themed story, four or more coordinating crafts, easy to follow photo directions, and all the materials included, that can be shared between 2 children.  A monthly subscription is $29.99 a month.  A 3-month pre-paid subscription is $28.33 a month, totaling $84.99, four times a year.  A 6-month subscription is $26.67, totaling $160.56, twice a month.  An annual pre-paid subscription is $25.00 a month, totaling $300, once a year.  For more information, go to wecraftbox.com.

male-teen.name: Craftsman Crate
male-teen.information: Craftsman Crate was born when the creator's sons told them there was nothing available for guys who wanted hands-on projects.  Well, now there is!  And it's for everybody.  A monthly subscription is $33.77 a month.  A 3-month pre-paid subscription is $32.77 a month, totaling $98.31, four times a year.  A 6-month pre-paid subscription is $31.77 a month, totaling $190.62, twice a year.  An annual subscription is $30.77 a month, totaling $369.23, once a year.  For more information, go to cratsmancrate.com.

male-adult.name: Hot Sauce of the Month Club
male-adult.information: Get the best artisan hot sauce delivered to your door each month.  Hand curated by the experts at Heat Hot Sauce Shop, only the best sauces are chosen, including many sauces that have won awards at major hot sauce festivals.  For one classic or medium heat bottle, it's $13.99 a month.  For one hot or extra hot heat bottle, it's $15.99 a month.  For three classic or medium heat bottles, it's $28.99 a month.  For three hot or extra hot bottles, it's $34.99 a month.  For more information, go to cratejoy.com.

female-baby.name: Lemon Berry
female-baby.information: With the Lemon Berry Box, you will receive four hand-tied bows each month.  Small bows are $13.99 a month.  Large bows are $15.99 a month.  For more information, go to cratejoy.com.

female-child.name: IBBeautiful
female-child.information: IBBeautiful is thoughtfully curated with the perfect items for tweens and teenage girls to realize how beautiful they are without comparison to others.  A monthly subscription is $25.00 a month.  For more information, go to www.ibbeautiful.com.

female-teen.name: Charm With Me Club
female-teen.information: Charm With Me Club will bring you the most uniquely geeky themed charms so that you can build your own bracelet to your liking.  A monthly subscription is $19.66 a month.  A 3-month pre-paid subscription is $19.66 a month, totaling $58.98, four times a year.  A 6-month pre-paid subscription is $19.33 a month, totaling $115.98, twice a year.  An annual pre-paid subscription is $18.50 a month, totaling $222.00, once a year.  For more information, go to www.charmwithmeclub.com.

female-adult.name: Once Upon a Book Club
female-adult.information: This subscription is a reading experience like no other.  Each month, you'll receive a newly released book and 3 to 6 wrapped gifts that are labeled with page numbers.  As you read, you open a gift.  A monthly subscription is $34.99 a month.  A 3-month pre-paid subscription is $33.66 a month, totaling $100.98, four times a month.  A 6-month pre-paid subscription is $33.17 a month, totaling $199.02, twice a year.  An annual subscription is $32.50 a month, totaling $390, once a year.  For more information, go to www.onceuponabookclub.com.

neutral-baby.name: Tiny Humans Read
neutral-baby.information: Tiny Humans Read is a monthly book box for kids ages 0 to 3.  Each month you'll get a collection of whimsical stories for your child to treasure.  A monthly subscription is $24.99 a month.  You can pre-pay for 3, 6, or 12 months at the $24.99 monthly price point.  For more information, go to www.tinyhumansread.com.

neutral-child.name: Green Kid Crafts
neutral-child.information: Empowering the next generation of leaders with hands-on science and art learning.  A monthly subscription is $23.95 a month.  A 3-month pre-paid subscription is $23.32 a month, totaling $69.96, four times a year.  A 6-month pre-paid subscription is $22.83 a month, totaling $$136.98, twice a year.  An annual subscription is 21.91 a month, totaling $262.92, once a year.  For more information, go to www.greenkidcraft.com.

neutral-teen.name: Smiling Socks
neutral-teen.information: You'll get fun mismatching socks delivered straight to your doorstep every month.  For one design a month, it's $17.95.  For two designs a month, it's $27.95 a month.  For three designs a month, it's $37.95 a month.  For more information, go to cratejoy.com.

neutral-adult.name: Escape the Crate
neutral-adult.information: Now you can bring all the fun of an escape room into your home with a different time-traveling adventure delivered every other month.  Work with friends to solve the riddles and conquer the puzzles.  For one box over two months, it's $29.99 per box, bi-monthly.  To pre-pay for two boxes over four months, it's $28.99 per box, totaling $57.98, three times a year.  To pre-pay for three boxes over six months, it's $27.99 per box, totaling $83.97, twice a year.  To pre-pay for six boxes over twelve months, it's $26.50 per box, totaling $159, once a year.  For more information, go to escape-the-crate.com.
